title: The ‘Hawkeye’ Trailer, ‘Y: The Last Man,’ and a Conversation With Lindsey Buckingham
description:
Chris and Andy talk about the ‘Hawkeye’ trailer that was just dropped and what we can expect from the new Marvel series (4:45). Then they discuss the first couple of episodes of the comic book adaptation ‘Y: The Last Man’ (17:14) before Andy is joined by Lindsey Buckingham to discuss his new solo album and more (36:06).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Guest: Lindsey Buckingham
Producer: Kaya McMullen
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
